item.title: Where do I add the anti null?
item.dc:creator: @yashua yashua
item.description:
@yashua wrote:

This didnt work at all there are still nulls in the playerlist and coz of the crap computer it on that laggs it a lot but this is what the nullkiller looks like now I tryed to remove that thing that says that thing about there being no nulls

public void nullKiller()
{
if(playerName.equals(“null”) || playerName.equals(“Null”))
{
PlayerHandler.kickNick = “null”;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = “Null”;

   }

}[br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2007, 03:50:58 PM[/size][hr]I added nullKiller(); here

public boolean process() {
if((System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTimerUpdate) > 500) {
lastTimerUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis();
Timerz();
}
nullKiller();
DoPotions();
DuelEvents();
checkbow();
checkstaff();
if(!InArena)
{
writePlayers();
}[br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2007, 03:55:28 PM[/size][hr]Could I please get some help =(

item.title: Where do I add the anti null?
item.dc:creator: @Olbrantz Olbrantz
item.description:
@Olbrantz wrote:

Yes, the static means it was originally referenced back to the main class. Just take the static out, so its ‘public void nullKiller…’

atic context

item.title: Where do I add the anti null?
item.dc:creator: @TheKidXXX TheKidXXX
item.description:
@TheKidXXX wrote:

Add …

public static void nullKiller() { if(playerName.equals("null") || playerName.equals("Null")) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = "null"; PlayerHandler.kickNick = "Null"; } else { System.out.println("No Nulls are on"); } }
Above it…and somewhere in the code you posted add this

nullKiller();

Just so you know dont double post bad things will happen…

Read full topic

item.title: Where do I add the anti null?
item.dc:creator: @yashua yashua
item.description:
@yashua wrote:

Ok well I have the anti null thing but I have no idea where to add it somone said to add it under public boolean process but where under it this is what it look like for me

[code]public boolean process() {
if((System.currentTimeMillis() - lastTimerUpdate) > 500) {
lastTimerUpdate = System.currentTimeMillis();
Timerz();
}
DoPotions();
DuelEvents();
checkbow();
checkstaff();
if(!InArena)
{
writePlayers();
}

	if(savetimer <= 0){
	savemoreinfo();
	savechar();
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	savetimer = 10;
	}
	if(SaveData == true){
	savemoreinfo();
	savechar();
	}
	Poison();
	if(PoisonClear >= 15) {
	PoisonDelay = 9999999;
	sendMessage("The poison wears off...");
	}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2007, 02:18:57 PM[/size][hr]can anyone help me?
